Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's
entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Extreme Class allies' DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g} for 4 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 260%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 60%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per Type Ki Sphere obtained
*When attacking*
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every Type Ki Sphere obtained*
- Recovers 2% HP
*When the Domain "Molten Lava of Natade Village" is active*
- Guards all attacks
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT & STR
excluded) to STR Ki Spheres at the start of the character's
attacking turn when the Domain is active
- {passiveImg:forever}Attacks are effective against all Types if the character
performs an attack when the Domain is active
*When the character or an ally attacking in the same turn is
KO'd starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry
turn*
- {passiveImg:once}Revives with 60% HP recovered
*After the character's or an ally's Revival Skill is activated*
- DEF 60%{passiveImg:up_g} when receiving an attack
*After the character's Revival Skill is activated*
- {passiveImg:forever}Changes Ki Spheres: PHY to INT
- "Uncontrollable Power" Category allies' ATK & DEF 60%{passiveImg:up_g}
within the character's attacking turn

5806.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn with 
a high chance of further raising DEF for 1 turn 
and causes colossal damage with 
a high chance of stunning the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

5850.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn with 
a high chance of further massively raising ATK 
for 1 turn and causes mega-colossal damage 
with a great chance of stunning the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Earth-Crushing Arm
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Massively raises ATK temporarily and 
causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
creates the Domain "Molten Lava 
of Natade Village" for 3 turns
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there is 
a "Goku's Family" Category enemy, 
or when all allies attacking in the 
same turn are "Uncontrollable Power" 
Category characters (once only)
